downloadTitle: Security Update for Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2013 R2 (KB)
downloadDescription: Dynamics NAV Web Client Cross-Site scripting Vulnerability
detailsSection: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists when Microsoft Dynamics NAV does not properly sanitize specially crafted web request on affected Dynamics in NAV Web Client. An authenticated attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a specially crafted request to an affected Dynamics NAV Web Client.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2013 R2 system requirements
installInstructionSection: See the following knowledge basse article: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/4482986
